main.name: Ignacio Casal
main.description: Front End Developer with three years of experience. Currently looking for opportunities in React to keep improving this skill and learn new ones.
main.bio: I’m a self-motivated, productive Front End Developer with three years of experience. Currently looking for opportunities in React to keep improving this skill and learn new ones.
main.bio2: I am open and willing to learn what is necessary to achieve the objectives that are presented. I am in constant professional growth keeping myself updated with the latest technologies.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
